body_html: I will be submitting a PR end of this week which will be addressing some parts of this issue, especially addressing number 3, where I'm consolidating THCGenerator, THCGeneratorState and THCRNGState into one struct, being passed through CUDAGenerator (like how currently there is a THGenerator for CPUGenerator.h and none for CUDAGenerator.h)
body_text: I will be submitting a PR end of this week which will be addressing some parts of this issue, especially addressing number 3, where I'm consolidating THCGenerator, THCGeneratorState and THCRNGState into one struct, being passed through CUDAGenerator (like how currently there is a THGenerator for CPUGenerator.h and none for CUDAGenerator.h)
body: I will be submitting a PR end of this week which will be addressing some parts of this issue, especially addressing number 3, where I'm consolidating `THCGenerator`, `THCGeneratorState` and `THCRNGState` into one struct, being passed through `CUDAGenerator` (like how currently there is a `THGenerator` for `CPUGenerator.h` and none for `CUDAGenerator.h`)
